description: This is the main activity source code for an Android Tic Tac Toe app, defining UI components, game logic, state management, and user interactions.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity for the Tic Tac Toe game handling UI, game state, and interactions.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes UI components and sets up the game board.

methods.name: onCellClicked
methods.description: Handles user clicks on game cells, updating game state and UI.

methods.name: updateStatus
methods.description: Updates the status text based on game state.

methods.name: disableAllCellsAfterGameOver
methods.description: Disables all game cells after game concludes.

methods.name: resetGameWithAnimation
methods.description: Resets the game with a fade animation.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets game variables and UI elements for a new game.

methods.name: checkWin
methods.description: Checks if the specified player has won.

methods.name: highlightWinningCells
methods.description: Highlights the cells forming the winning line.

methods.name: applyAlpha
methods.description: Returns a color with adjusted alpha transparency.

methods.name: dp
methods.description: Converts density-independent pixels to actual pixels.
